name: Xtreme Lab Safety
description:
Xtreme Lab Safety is a humorous 3D VR lab safety simulator game about learning common sense lab safety procedures in a chemistry lab. As an intern you work in an "XTREME Labs" cubicle producing compounds from dangerous chemicals and must deal with abstract hazardous chemical reactions to fulfill your tasks.

Xtreme Lab Safety was created over the autumn semester of 2019 by Big Brain Indie SB, a group of game students at Nord University.

The game was made for Oculus Rift or Oculus Rift S.
